lyrics:
26 contributorscarried away lyricsverse 1
stare out the window
oh why am i so
jaded and waiting for some kinda miracle yeah
love doesnt live here
and ive cried enough tears
sorry if i cant imagine that you care oh

chorus
please
i never saw it coming
you wanna take me away
so please
dont let it be for nothing
before we get carried away yeah

verse 2
aint my fault im guarded
im good ive been okay
fronting i dont wanna be loved anyway
and thats why i do as i say
cause i had a bad case
losing a game i never wanted to play oh

chorus
please
i never saw it coming
you wanna take me away
so please
dont let it be for nothing
before we get carried away yeah
you might also likebridge
before we cross the line
i i dont wanna take my chances if this aint it oh no
if youre not sure then let me go ooh

chorus
please
i never saw it coming
you wanna take me away
so please

before we get carried away yeah5embed
